title: Secure Password Generator | Protect Your Online Identity

hero.title: Protect Your Online Identity
hero.subtitle: In a world full of cyber threats, a strong password is your first line of defense

hero.title: Create Unique Usernames
hero.subtitle: Generate secure and original usernames for all your online accounts

random.title: Random
random.text: Avoid personal information like your name or birth date that can be easily linked to you.

simple.title: Simple yet Complex
simple.text: Choose a username that you can easily remember, but is difficult for others to guess.

unique.title: Unique per Account
unique.text: Use a different username for each account to prevent hackers from finding multiple accounts.

security.title: Extra Security
security.text: Combine your unique username with a strong password and two-factor authentication for maximum security.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.text: Our usernames contain no personal information that could reveal your identity.

universal.title: Universally Usable
universal.text: Generate usernames that can be used on virtually all platforms and services.

random.title: Completely Random
random.text: Our algorithms ensure random and unique usernames that are not predictable.

secure.title: Safe & Reliable
secure.text: All passwords are generated locally without being stored or transmitted.

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.text: Generate strong passwords in seconds with our advanced algorithms.

responsive.title: Fully Responsive
responsive.text: Use our tools on any device, from desktop to smartphone.

tips.title: Password Tips
tips.subtitle: Discover how to protect your online identity with these essential security tips

length.title: Use Long Passwords
length.text: The longer the password, the harder to crack. Use at least 12 characters.

patterns.title: Avoid Patterns
patterns.text: Don't use predictable patterns or personal information.

unique.title: Unique Passwords
unique.text: Use a unique password for each account.

2fa.title: Enable 2FA
2fa.text: Enable two-factor authentication wherever possible for extra security.

software.title: Keep Software Up-to-Date
software.text: Ensure your operating system, browsers, and apps are always updated with the latest security patches.

wifi.title: Be Careful with Public WiFi
wifi.text: Use a VPN when connecting to public WiFi networks to protect your data.

phishing.title: Recognize Phishing
phishing.text: Be alert to suspicious emails and messages trying to extract your personal information.

manager.title: Use Password Managers
manager.text: Consider using a password manager to securely store all your unique passwords.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | SemSecurity
privacy.subtitle: We value the protection of your privacy and personal data

intro.text1: At SemSecurity, we highly value the protection of your privacy. In this privacy policy, we explain what data we collect, why we collect it, and how we use it.

collected.title: 1. Collected Data
collected.text: When you visit our website, we collect the following information:
items: Date and time of your visit

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Data Collection
purpose.text: We collect this data for the following purposes:
items: Analyzing user behavior to optimize our website
Securing our website against abuse and fraud

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.text: Our website uses functional cookies to store your language preference. These cookies are necessary for the functioning of the website and are not used for tracking or advertising purposes.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage
storage.text: The collected data is stored on secure servers and is not kept longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.

sharing.title: 5. Sharing of Data
sharing.text: We do not share your data with third parties unless legally required or necessary for providing our services.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to correct inaccurate personal data
Right to delete your personal data
Right to restrict the processing of your personal data
Right to object to the processing of your personal data
